item.title: Swift
item.author: Author
item.description: Declarations let Use let to make a constant 1 2 3 let implicitInteger = 80 let implicitDouble = 70.0 let explicitDouble: Double = 70 var use var to make a variable 1 2 3 var implicitInteger = 80 var implicitDouble = 70.0 var explicitDouble: Double = 70 Question Mark ? Single - Write a question mark after the type of a value to mark the value as optional.

item.title: Threading
item.author: Author
item.description: threading allows you to have different parts of your program run concurrently and can simplify your design.
